comments:
M6

steps to reproduce

1. Go to the keybinding dialog
2. Step to the category dropdown using tab
3. Use Up/Down arrow keys to select a category
4. When the 'Team' entry is reached, I get this:

java.lang.NullPointerException
FYI , this bug occurs on OS X too.

I believe this error can be tracked back to the cvs.ui plugin.  This problem
prevents the user from binding keys to "Team" commands.  The NPE is thrown
because the category name doesn't match the category name reports by the action
set.  The action set reports its category name as
"org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui.actionSet", while the actual category name is
"org.eclipse.team.ui.commands.category".

I'm going to fix up our code to be a bit less prone to exceptions at this point.
 It will instead display an empty combo box for the list of commands.

The Team section had no commands so I removed it. It can be readded when and 
if there are team commands that support keybindings.
